name: Napoleon I
role: Emperor of the French, military leader

verified_details.detail_0: Founded the House of Bonaparte in 1804
verified_details.detail_1: Staged the coup of 18 Brumaire in 1799
verified_details.detail_2: Transformed the French First Republic into the First French Empire in 1804
verified_details.detail_3: Defeated at the Battle of Waterloo on 18 June 1815

verified_details.detail_2: Son of Emperor Napoleon I and Empress Marie Louise

verified_details.detail_0: Commanded forces at the Battle of Waterloo
Participated in the Battle of Ligny
verified_details.detail_1: Participated in the Battle of Waterloo
